'Bar' (; ) is a city located on the Rov River in the Vinnytsia Oblast (province)
of western Ukraine. It is the administrative center of the Barskyi Raion
(district), and is part of the historic region of Podolia. The current estimated
population is 17,776 (01.nov.2011).
